title: Ded-Amulet
description:
Light blue glazed faience amulet in the shape of a Djed-pillar. The pillar has four crossbars, and the binding below them is modeled in relief. The back pillar is pierced for suspension, and its top is bevelled towards the rear. 
Condition: Glaze on upper part of piece gone drab and dark; incrustation on upper part and yellow stains below.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
